member.name: TOKEN_STATISTICS
member.summary: The TOKEN_STATISTICS structure contains information about an access token. An application can retrieve this information by calling the function.

member.name: TOKEN_STATISTICS.TokenId
member.summary: Specifies a locally unique identifier (LUID) that identifies this instance of the token object.

member.name: TOKEN_STATISTICS.AuthenticationId
member.summary: Specifies an LUID assigned to the session this token represents. There can be many tokens representing a single logon session.

member.name: TOKEN_STATISTICS.ExpirationTime
member.summary: Specifies the time at which this token expires. Expiration times for access tokens are not currently supported.

member.name: TOKEN_STATISTICS.TokenType
member.summary: Specifies a enumeration type indicating whether the token is a primary or impersonation token.

member.name: TOKEN_STATISTICS.ImpersonationLevel
member.summary: Specifies a enumeration type indicating the impersonation level of the token. This member is valid only if the TokenType is TokenImpersonation.

member.name: TOKEN_STATISTICS.DynamicCharged
member.summary: Specifies the amount, in bytes, of memory allocated for storing default protection and a primary group identifier.

member.name: TOKEN_STATISTICS.DynamicAvailable
member.summary: Specifies the portion of memory allocated for storing default protection and a primary group identifier not already in use. This value is returned as a count of free bytes.

member.name: TOKEN_STATISTICS.GroupCount
member.summary: Specifies the number of supplemental group security identifiers (SIDs) included in the token.

member.name: TOKEN_STATISTICS.PrivilegeCount
member.summary: Specifies the number of privileges included in the token.

member.name: TOKEN_STATISTICS.ModifiedId
member.summary: Specifies an LUID that changes each time the token is modified. An application can use this value as a test of whether a security context has changed since it was last used.
